forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
